## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
Hey, I've been hearing about the simultaneous blockchain and blockchain liquidity pool launches on Verus. What's one key feature of those launches?

**AI Assistant:**
One key feature of the simultaneous blockchain and blockchain liquidity pool launches on Verus is that the bridge converter liquidity pool earns fees on the new blockchain, with no rent going back to the Verus blockchain, ensuring seamless connectivity. This is a great innovation in the Verus ecosystem.

**User:**
That sounds interesting. Can you tell me more about blockchain-based crowdfunding currency launches on Verus? How do they work, and what happens if minimum participation levels are not met?

**AI Assistant:**
On Verus, blockchain-based crowdfunding currency launches allow you to set required minimum levels of worldwide participation in your preferred currencies on chain. If the minimum levels are not met by the start time of your blockchain, all participants will automatically get a refund of all their pre-conversions, less the network fees. This ensures that participants are protected in case the minimum participation levels are not reached.

**User:**
Got it, thanks for explaining that. What's the advantage of using VerusIDs in blockchain-based crowdfunding currency launches on Verus?

**AI Assistant:**
Using VerusIDs in blockchain-based crowdfunding currency launches on Verus allows for vesting schedules in the pre-allocations, which provides an additional layer of flexibility and control in the launch process. It's another way that VerusIDs bring value to the table.

**User:**
I think I'm starting to get a better sense of the Verus ecosystem. Can you tell me more about the Verus multi-currency, multi-chain network? What benefits does it provide?

**AI Assistant:**
The Verus multi-currency, multi-chain network is a decentralized network that allows the creation of an unlimited number of interoperable blockchains. It provides decentralized blockchain-specific bridge confirmation through Notary IDs, enabling public blockchains available to the world for merge mining and staking. This allows for unlimited scale and new use cases, making it a powerful tool for building blockchain-based applications. The Verus multi-currency, multi-chain network is a key part of what makes Verus so innovative and powerful.
What is a key feature of the simultaneous blockchain and blockchain liquidity pool launches on Verus?

One key feature of the simultaneous blockchain and blockchain liquidity pool launches on Verus is that the bridge converter liquidity pool earns fees on the new blockchain, with no rent going back to the Verus blockchain, ensuring seamless connectivity.

s.
### Simultaneous blockchain and blockchain liquidity pool launches
- Launch of a world class, worldwide, merge-mineable blockchain along with a fully decentralized or centralized “bridge” converter liquidity pool as part of defining a new blockchain. Bridge converter currencies have the same flexibility as other fractional 100% asset backed or partially asset backed currencies, but is bound to the launch of the new blockchain, runs on the new blockchain, and all fees generated via cross chain fee conversions or general use of the liquidity pool are earned on the new blockchain with no rent going back to the Verus blockchain, only seamless connectivity.
### Blockchain-based, crowdfunding currency launches with minimum participation or automatic refunds, including for dual launches (blockchain and bridge)
- Set required minimum levels of worldwide participation in your preferred currencies on chain. If by the start time of your blockchain, minimums are not met, all participants will automatically get a refund of all of their pre-conversions, less the network fees. The launch options also provide for maximum participation in one or more currencies, pre-launch discounts, price neutral pre-allocations to select IDs that increase the fractional reserve ratio to issue currencies, similarly price neutral carve-outs of proceeds, and pre-launch discounts for early participants. Using VerusIDs, launches can also include vesting schedules in the pre-allocations as well.
### An interoperable, multichain network for new use cases and unlimited scale**
- The Verus multi-currency, multi-chain network allows the creation of an unlimited number of interoperable blockchains in the Verus network. Notary IDs, specified at chain definition, provide decentralized blockchain-specific bridge confirmation, enabling public blockchains available to the world for merge mining and staking, as w

If the minimum levels are not met by the start time of your blockchain, all participants will automatically get a refund of all their pre-conversions, less the network fees. This ensures that participants are protected in case the minimum participation levels are not reached.
